alert.note: Alert for Clay; Hall; Hamilton; Merrick; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:34AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clay, west central York, Hamilton, southwestern Merrick and northeastern Hall Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 734 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chapman, or 7 miles northeast of Grand Island, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grand Island, Aurora, Henderson, Hampton, Giltner, Chapman, Phillips and Stockham. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 321 and 342. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
